qas.question: Which two world leaders had negotiations that relieved the Cold War?

answers.text: Richard M. Nixon and Soviet Premier Leonid Brezhnev

qas.question: When did President Nixon and Brezhnev of the USSR end the Cold War?

context: In <a1_0>May 1972<a1_0/>, President <a0_0>Richard M. Nixon and Soviet Premier Leonid Brezhnev<a0_0/> negotiated an easing of relations known as detente, creating a temporary "thaw" in the Cold War. In the spirit of good sportsmanship, the time seemed right for cooperation rather than competition, and the notion of a continuing "race" began to subside.
